item.title: Adding spawned NPC's into an Array list
item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:2, topic:402757”] private void animateArmor(Client c, int[] usedArmor, int npcId, int hitPoints, int maxHit, int attack, int defence) { c.getPA().walkTo(0, 3); for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++) { c.getItems().deleteItem(usedArmor[i], 1); } c.spawned = true; Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc(c, npcId, xCoord, yCoord, 0, 0, hitPoints, maxHit, attack, defence, true, true); }
um use this as a base and mess around with it?[/quote]
Okay, thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding spawned NPC's into an Array list
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

private void animateArmor(Client c, int[] usedArmor, int npcId, int hitPoints, int maxHit, int attack, int defence) { c.getPA().walkTo(0, 3); for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++) { c.getItems().deleteItem(usedArmor[i], 1); } c.spawned = true; Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc(c, npcId, xCoord, yCoord, 0, 0, hitPoints, maxHit, attack, defence, true, true); }
um use this as a base and mess around with it?

item.title: Adding spawned NPC's into an Array list
item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

I’m trying to make a wave-type minigame and I need to add spawned NPC’s into an array list.

[code] public void spawnANPC(int npcID, int absX, int absY, int heightLevel) {
server.npcHandler.npcSpawn(npcID, absX, absY, 0);
npcs.add(???);

}[/code]

How would I make it so it adds the spawned NPC’s into the array list? I have tried so hard to make it work but can’t get it to work properly.

Read full topic
